Hi.

As for CRM 2011, the tooltip function is using unsupported method to manipulate with DOM objects (There is no supported way). I am not sure if changing it to top options will actually modify the DOM. If so, that is why the function will not work.

If you still need to have the tooltip, it is better to have a look at the DOM objects after selecting the top options and try to add the tooltip.
